DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Trial Offer Financial Navigation Enrollment Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator of whether or not the patient was enrolled in a clinical trial that offered financial navigation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Trial Offer Financial Navigation Enrollment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.:To provide or supply something, such as a product or service._A patient support program that provides financial counseling and education, and connects patients with appropriate resources to reduce financial barriers to healthcare and minimize financial stress and burden._The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes. Interventions include but are not restricted to drugs, cells and other biological products, surgical procedures, radiologic procedures, devices, behavioral treatments, process-of-care changes, and preventive care.

Concepts.definition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.

Property.preferredDefinition: To provide or supply something, such as a product or service._A patient support program that provides financial counseling and education, and connects patients with appropriate resources to reduce financial barriers to healthcare and minimize financial stress and burden._The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled.

Concepts.definition: To provide or supply something, such as a product or service.

A patient support program that provides financial counseling and education, and connects patients with appropriate resources to reduce financial barriers to healthcare and minimize financial stress and burden.
The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was the patient enrolled in a clinical trial that offered financial navigation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient enrolled in EAQ221CD or S1912CD given financial navigation is offered as part of these two trials?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient enrolled in other clinical trials that offer out of pocket payment or financial navigation assistance?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient enrolled in EAQ221CD or S1912CD?
